title: Interval for difference in mean ice cream rating

content.question: Which of the following could be the constructed interval?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parenthesis, negative 20 comma negative 15, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>20</mn></mrow></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>15</mn></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, negative 2.1 comma negative 1.3, close parenthesis " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2.1</mn></mrow></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1.3</mn></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, negative 1.4 comma 2.6, close parenthesis " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1.4</mn></mrow></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>2.6</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open parenthesis, negative 2.1 comma negative 1.3, close parenthesis " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2.1</mn></mrow></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1.3</mn></mrow></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 7.7: Justifying a Claim About the Difference of Two Means Based on a Confidence Interval

skill.text: Skill 4.D: Justify a claim based on a confidence interval.
